title: Financial Overview
description: Share your financial situation to help us identify assistance programs and resources

fields.label: Approximate Monthly Income
fields.help: Total monthly income from all sources (Social Security, pensions, employment, investments, family support, etc.)

fields.label: Approximate Total Assets
fields.help: Total value of liquid assets (checking, savings, cash), investments (stocks, bonds, funds), retirement accounts (IRA, 401k, pension), real estate equity, and life insurance cash value

fields.label: Primary Financial Concern
fields.help: What financial topic would you like to focus on?
